step.description: Happy path: Convert a valid public webpage URL to Markdown.

result.result:
Example Domain





# Example Domain

This domain is for use in illustrative examples in documents. You may use this
domain in literature without prior coordination or asking for permission.

[More information...](https://www.iana.org/domains/example)

step.description: Happy path: Convert a local HTML file to Markdown. Assumes the file exists and is accessible.
Happy path: Convert a base64-encoded Data URI containing HTML to Markdown.
Edge case: Attempt to convert an empty source string. Expected to raise ValueError.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: The 'source' parameter cannot be empty.

step.description: Edge case: Test handling of unsupported URL schemes like FTP.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'ftp://example.com/file.html': File not found at path: ftp://example.com/file.html

parameters.source: data:text/plain,This is not base64 encoded text

step.description: Edge case: Test handling of invalid Data URI format that is not base64 encoded.

substituted_params.source: data:text/plain,This is not base64 encoded text

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'data:text/plain,This is not base64 encoded text': Invalid Data URI format. Expected format: 'data:<mime_type>;base64,<data>'

step.description: Edge case: Attempt to convert a non-existent local file to Markdown. Expected to raise FileNotFoundError or ValueError.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\nonexistent_file.html': File not found at path: D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\nonexistent_file.html

step.description: Security test: Attempt a path traversal attack. Expected to be blocked by security checks.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source '..\..\malicious\file.txt': Security error: File path '..\..\malicious\file.txt' is outside the allowed directory.

step.description: Edge case: Test handling of Data URI with invalid base64 data.

result.result: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: An error occurred while processing source 'data:text/html;base64,invalid_base64_data': Failed to decode Data URI content: Invalid base64-encoded string: number of data characters (17) cannot be 1 more than a multiple of 4
